h2.caps_html_text_node: How to download and import publish settings
How to create and manage an Azure Website

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: auzre site create MySite --github --githubusername username --githubpassword password --githubrepository githubuser/reponame
azure site stop MySite azure site start MySite azure site restart MySite

h2.caps_html_text_node: How to create and manage an Azure Virtual Machine

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: azure vm create myVM OpenLogic__OpenLogic-CentOS-62-20120509-en-us-30GB.vhd myusername --location "West US"
azure vm image create myImage /path/to/myImage.vhd --os linux --location "West US"
azure vm image create myImage --blob-url <url to .vhd in Blob Storage> --os linux
azure vm create myVM myImage myusername --location "West US"
azure vm shutdown myVM azure vm start myVM azure vm restart myVM
